title: Should I buy Nocturne or Blitzcrank?
body: IT'S SO HARD TO DECIDE D: PLEASE TELL ME IN LE COMMENTS

replies.body: Well, do you prefer playing jungle or support?
Lol if someone jgled with blitz they'd be getting rekt.
I got blizty and now I want either a chroma, the new icon, or nocturne. lol.

I suggest you to buy Nocturne, he can block the next ability of an enemy with his W ability, and he gains bonus attack speed for the next 5 seconds.
I have played Blitzcrank before, but it is not easy for him to grab hold of an enemy champion with his Rocket Grab ability (his Q ability), Blitzcrank's Q ability can be easily dodged If the opponent champion is cautions enough.
Consider Blitzcrank as one of your last resorts.
This is just my personal opinion, ultimately the decision is up to you.
You may want to try Blitzcrank before you buy him.
I main blitzy, purely cus he is a lot of fun. Fun to take mid in norms too xD
I already have shaco tho and he's my main jgler
If you're just playing for fun at the moment blitz is your guy
Depends on the role you like, if you prefer playing support then go blitzcrank and vice versa. I recommend going nocturne tho cause that dude can carry a game
